text.author: Alex Wilson
text.title: The Last Christmas of Mrs. Claus
text.summary: Santa Claus's second wife, Betty Moroz, plays online video games with her friends Williams and Gomez while making dinner on Christmas Eve, and is then disappointed when Santa gets a call from his secretary Ginny and goes out to take care of the children of the world, missing dinner.
